attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i want to own a an american pitbull . making them illegal is like saying because germans killed innocent jews during the war Germans should be illegal. its not the dogs that are mentally ill its the sick people u as a pathetic goverment let in,or release from prison. i dont understand how "you people" get to treat people like me so badly . maybe blair and gordon brown should sit down with people like me and my generation and wonder why we are stabbing people for money everyone smoked weed ,enough people smoke crack cocaine. in fairness its all the governments fault ,none of u have any real ideas about living in the uk ,posh upper class(not who u are who u know)

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
